review: Its a very nice setup... the only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is that it came in German as the default language. It took some searching on how to switch to English as the main language.It works as advertised and the mobile app works great for voice commands and a keyboard  for entering passwords ect.
author: JSH

review: We are very happy with the Amazon Fire TV Stick. Easy to install and works great!! We would recommend this to others.
author: L. Seaberg

review: its awesome, easy to use and setup.
author: William Barstow

review: HAPPY WITH THE PURCHASE IT DOES HAVE A LITTLE LAG TIME WITH THE Panasonic TV BUT WORKS FINE.
author: Pha Byron Burns

review: Great product and easy to use.
